item.title: Hermit Twins – and a Talking Cow – Share Life and Poetry in Miro Remo’s Karlovy Vary Winner ‘Better Go Mad in the Wild’
item.description: A hybrid, a drama, a fairy tale and a documentary – even Slovak director Miro Remo doesn’t know how to define Karlovy Vary Film Festival winner “Better Go Mad in the Wild.” And he doesn’t care.
